column3:
vertical profile of layer depths for the ocean
(in meters); for e.g., if "ocean_levels=30,"
"ocean_z" should have 30 settings; see 
run/README.namelist for details

vertical profile of ocean temps (in K); 
for e.g., if "ocean_levels=30,"
"ocean_t" should have 30 settings; see 
run/README.namelist for details

vertical profile of ocean salinity; 
for e.g., if "ocean_levels=30,"
"ocean_s" should have 30 settings; see 
run/README.namelist for details
